about_the_game:
'Today my husband was not my husband.'

The love story is a Tzukur adventure about a strange event that takes place around the main character Mira.

Nine years ago, Mira was a high school girl who lost her boyfriend, Jaewon, in a tragic accident.

But time slowly washed away the mummy's wounds, as did everything in the world.

Nine years later, Mira did what she wanted and married someone who loved her and lived a satisfying life.

Until history changes for unknown reasons.

In a changed history, you have to make the most important choice of her life with a mummy who is embarrassed by strangers and events.

What kind of story is hidden in Mira?

And how does your choice lead the mummy to an end?

This isn't a romance, but it's a clear [love story] anyway.

[Love Story] is a simple Tzukur story game with a high proportion of events.

Depending on your choice within the game, the storyline in the middle, as well as the various endings, changes.

Some objects show slightly different stories depending on the number or order of selection.

The playtime of each game is not long, but you need to make a careful decision to see the whole story because you take the choice to the end without saving it.

name: love story
short_description: - It is a simple Tsukkur story game with a high proportion of events. -Depending on the choices made in the game, various endings and the development of the story in the middle will change. -Some objects show slightly different stories depending on the number or order of selection.
